foo {
  a = 42;
  b = "foo";
  x = boop(a);
  c = group(b, x);
  goto bar;
}
bar {
  y = boop;
  goto foo;
}
----
application/datalog
instr{idx: 0, op: store{val: 42, var: "a"}}.
instr{idx: 1, op: store{val: "foo", var: "b"}}.
instr{idx: 2, op: store{val: call{args: ["a"]}, var: "x"}}.
instr{idx: 3, op: store{val: call{args: ["b","x"]}, var: "c"}}.
instr{idx: 4, op: goto{dest: 5}}.
instr{idx: 5, op: store{val: call{args: []}, var: "y"}}.
instr{idx: 6, op: goto{dest: 0}}.
